response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its value to you, I propose a special introductory price of $7,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let me know. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 7500}
